site_name: Trees in communal car park of Byron Close, off Barrow Road.
description: (09SP) Sorbus sp. - Reshape crown by reducing extended branches by no more than 0.5m to balance canopy.(09SQ) Alnus sp. - Reduce crown by 2m to maintain a decent crown form and mitigate encroachment issues.(09SR) Betula pendula -  Reshape crown by reducing extended branches by no more than 1m to balance canopy.(09SS) Betula pendula - Prune back lateral branches towards property to appropriate growth points to give 1-2m clearance and maintain a healthy crown form.(09SU) Alnus sp. - Reshape crown by reducing extended branches by no more than 1m to balance canopy.(09SY) Prunus sp. - Reshape crown by reducing extended branches by no more than 0.5m to balance canopy.(09SZ) Unidentified Broadleaf sp. x3 - Prune to curb line to mitigate encroachment issues.(09T0) Alnus sp. - Reduce crown by 2m and crown lift to 2m from ground level to mitigate light and encroachment issues.See attached plan for tree specifiactions
